import React from 'react' import './Vendordetail.css' import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { getProductDetails } from '../redux/actions/productActions'; // Spinner import Spinner from './Spinner/Spinner'; import dish from '../images/dish.jpg' import chef from '../images/chef.jpg' function Vendordetail({ match, history }) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const ProductsDetails = useSelector(state => state.getProductDetails); const { product, loading, error } = ProductsDetails; useEffect(() => { if (product && match.params.id !== product._id) { dispatch(getProductDetails(match.params.id)) } }, [dispatch, match, product]); const vendordetails= ()=>{ return(

*/}

) } return (

) }
) } export default Vendordetail
